title: [BUG] Long import times
body:
**Describe the bug**

It takes a few seconds to import cudf today

**Steps/Code to reproduce bug**

```
In [1]: import numpy, pandas

In [2]: %time import cudf
CPU times: user 432 ms, sys: 132 ms, total: 564 ms
Wall time: 2.44 s
```

<details>

